formattedAddress: 107 Suffolk St #303, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 107 Suffolk St #303, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: The team has been incredibly responsive and helpful both by the phone and email. If you are looking to visit, it is best to book an appointment through a website. For a quote, I sent a request online and they responded right away with many options.

text.text: The team has been incredibly responsive and helpful both by the phone and email. If you are looking to visit, it is best to book an appointment through a website. For a quote, I sent a request online and they responded right away with many options.

originalText.text:
Wow what a find!  I purchased a burlap coffee sack in Colombia a few years ago.  And I have gone to multiple framers in the city to get it mounted.  No one could give me a direct answer on how they would do it that I was always left unsure of what the final product would look like.  And since the sack would have to be cut up I didn't want to do something I'd end up hating.  Thank god I waited until I found these guys!  The moment I walked in they were clear and concise about methods and options for the final product.  They were so helpful in working with me with the budget I had and still wanting to make it look perfect.  Esp the frame!  I was going to choose a different (more $) one and they suggested the one I got which was less $ and so perfect for the finish!  I think I have been going to low grade consumer companies this whole time - these guys are artistic professionals and will be my go-to place from now on!!
Do not hesitate going here!

originalText.text: I can’t speak highly enough of Frames and Stretchers. I recently decided to get one of my drawings professionally framed and my experience with Frames and Stretchers was leaps and bounds above my past custom framing experience at a different business. They treated my work with the utmost care and respect and worked with me to figure out what type of frame would work best with my piece, unlike other framers who just want to sell you on the most expensive option. The price is very reasonable for the quality and service provided—highly recommend!

originalText.text: Doesn’t mention by appointment only and was extremely condescending to me when I came through. Do not go here if you wanted to be treated poorly.

text.text: Doesn’t mention by appointment only and was extremely condescending to me when I came through. Do not go here if you wanted to be treated poorly.

originalText.text: Completely beyond my expectations! They did an absolutely flawless job, executed the framework well, and handled my artwork with extreme care. There was an abundance of choices and the employees went out of their way to help me pick one. Thank you for your utmost professionalism. I’m glad I chose this store. Very pleased with the commitment you put into the work. Highly recommended!
